content.raw:
The RaySensor_TEST should be fixed now.

This pull request breaks the hokuyo model because the min_range value is actually used to ignore the model collision boxes. If that is the expected behaviour, then you can ignore this pull request. Otherwise, to enable the ray sensor, you would have to move it above the collision box by setting its pose to: <pose>0.01 0 0.035 0 -0 0</pose> but that would change its behaviour. A better solution would be to add a list of collision boxes that must be ignored by the sensor or a <self_collide> like parameter that would automatically make the sensor ignore all its link-related collision boxes.
content.html:
The RaySensor_TEST should be fixed now.

This pull request breaks the hokuyo model because the min_range value is actually used to ignore the model collision boxes. If that is the expected behaviour, then you can ignore this pull request. Otherwise, to enable the ray sensor, you would have to move it above the collision box by setting its pose to: <pose>0.01 0 0.035 0 -0 0</pose> but that would change its behaviour. A better solution would be to add a list of collision boxes that must be ignored by the sensor or a <self_collide> like parameter that would automatically make the sensor ignore all its link-related collision boxes.
